code: import React from'react';import{Heart,Leaf,Sun,Truck}from'lucide-react';import'./features.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FarmFeatures=()=>{const features=[{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heart,{color:"tomato",size:48}),title:"Unmatched Quality",description:"Hand-picked grapes at peak ripeness, ensuring exceptional sweetness and flavor in every bite."},{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sun,{color:"#eab308",size:48}),title:"Naturally Sun-Dried Raisins",description:"Traditional sun-drying methods preserve the natural taste and nutrients of our raisins."},{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Leaf,{color:"#059669",size:48}),title:"Sustainable Farming",description:"Eco-friendly methods ensure our grapes and raisins are free from harmful chemicals."},{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Truck,{color:"#3b82f6",size:48}),title:"Farm-to-Table Freshness",description:"Direct from our vineyards to your table, guaranteeing the freshest produce."}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"farm-features-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center mb-12",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"farm-features-title",children:"Why Choose Krushivrund Farm"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"farm-features-subtitle",children:"Discover the exceptional quality and care behind our premium grapes and raisins"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"farm-features-grid",children:features.map((feature,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"farm-feature-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-center mb-4",children:feature.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"farm-feature-title",children:feature.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"farm-feature-description",children:feature.description})]},index))})]});};export default FarmFeatures;
